item.title: Ten Years On: Farset Labs' 10th Birthday Maker Day / Party
item.dc:creator: bolster
item.description:
Originally published at: https://blog.farsetlabs.org.uk/2022/03/ten-years-on-farset-labs-10th-birthday-maker-day-party/

Yes, the beers can be drank from the box while the beers are in the box, as is tradition We‚Äôre Turning 10! Farset Labs was opened to the Belfast Maker Community in April 2012. Over the past decade, we‚Äôve made a lot, broken a lot, grown a lot and learned‚Ä¶ hopefully something. Come join us on Saturday the 9th of April for an afternoon and evening of making and celebration, kicking off with an Open ‚ÄòMaker Day‚Äô from 1pm to 6pm, and the main celebration, which will kick off from 7pm, and will include drinks, refreshments, and memories. If you haven‚Äôt been back in Farset Labs for a while (particularly since the renovations‚Ä¶), this is the perfect re-introduction to Northern Ireland‚Äôs Makerspace. Also, if you‚Äôre a past or‚Ä¶

item.title: Global Game Jam | 29th ‚Äì 31st Jan 2021
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
Originally published at: https://blog.farsetlabs.org.uk/2021/01/global-game-jam-29th-31st-jan-2021/

Farset Labs has hosted Northern Ireland‚Äôs only public site of the international ‚ÄúGlobal Game Jam‚Äù hackathon for the past 8 years, and this year they‚Äôre bringing it back ‚Äì again ‚Äì virtually. In the face of ‚Äòunprecedented times‚Äò, while the space, events facilities, co-working facilities and new-and-improved workshop (and Laser Cutter‚Ä¶) are still available to socially-distanced members, this year we can‚Äôt offer the usual warm, pizza and burrito fueled welcome we have over nearly the past decade to Northern Irelands Games Development community. So, as a have teamed up with our friends at the NI Game Dev Network to coordinate the Northern Ireland site of GGJ online due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Starting with a live-streamed kickoff event at 7pm on Friday 29th January, the jam will run‚Ä¶

item.title: [IGNORE ME BUT KEPT TO SHAME BOLSTER] Farset Labs' Legal Encounter
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
Originally published at: https://blog.farsetlabs.org.uk/2012/11/farset-labs-legal-encounter/

UPDATED: The original letters sent to Farset Labs have been linked to throughout the article for context and transparency. Further questions will be answered via email at admin@farsetlabs.org.uk Farset Labs has gone from strength to strength since opening its doors in April of this year, and the community has grown and matured quickly, but our summer progress was slower than was hoped for. Our entire model and ethos is built on transparency and democracy, so we publish this document to explain to our membership and supporters the difficulties placed in our path due to litigation launched by Latens/Pace plc. Out of the blue, on the 14th June, multiple copies of a letter were hand delivered to Farset Labs by Pinsent Masons, legal representatives of Latens/Pace, as well as emailed‚Ä¶

Yeah‚Ä¶ see the comment below‚Ä¶ Sorry

2 posts - 2 participants

Read full topic
item.source: [IGNORE ME BUT KEPT TO SHAME BOLSTER] Farset Labs' Legal Encounter

item.title: üîí Building Temporarily Closing
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
Originally published at: https://blog.farsetlabs.org.uk/2020/03/covid-19-building-temporarily-closing/

On the 23rd of March Boris Johnson announced a complete UK lockdown amid the COVID-19 crisis.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LlJIwTd9fqI As a result, the Farset Labs building is going to be closed until further notice. The doors will remain open until 7pm on Friday the 27th of March to allow members to collect any necessary belongings and equipment.A (remote) Town Hall will be hosted on Wednesday at 7pm ‚Äì 8pm for any of your questions.meet.google.com/rup-uysj-eni In the meantime, some important questions are answered below. Is Farset Labs stopping all operations?No, you‚Äôll start to see way more happening online and we hope you join the mischief! http://slackin.farsetlabs.org.ukhttps://discourse.farsetlabs.org.ukhttps://twitter.com/FarsetLabs Can I access the space after the 27th of March?No, until further notice, other than in exceptional circumstances on a case by case basis. In such‚Ä¶

item.title: Statement on #COVID19
item.dc:creator: bolster
item.description:
Originally published at: https://blog.farsetlabs.org.uk/2020/03/statement-on-covid19/

In times like this, the physical building of Farset Labs is less important than the community; social distancing doesn‚Äôt mean social isolation. Whether you‚Äôre a member or not, stay connected on our Slack, Share stuff that you think is cool on our Discourse, and when open meetings come up, please dial in just to chill out.

item.title: Data Art NI - Open DataNI Outreach Funding
item.dc:creator: bolster
item.description:
Originally published at: https://blog.farsetlabs.org.uk/2020/03/data-art-ni-open-datani-outreach-funding/

Data Art NI is running meetups across Northern Ireland to bring the tech, creative, and public policy sectors together, so share their successes, failures, experiments and experiences, in order to build a shared understanding of how we can make the world, if not a better place, at least a more informed one!

1 post - 1 participant

Read full topic
